TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ToolTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ICancelableTask
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolTask extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ICancelableTask, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
Public MustInherit Class ToolTask Inherits Task Implements ICancelableTask
public ref class ToolTask abstract : Microsoft::Build::Utilities::Task, Microsoft::Build::Framework::ICancelableTask
type ToolTask = class inherit Task interface ICancelableTask interface ITask

summary.span: 在派生窗体中重写时，为包装命令行工具的任务提供功能。

span.span: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for a task that wraps a command line tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象类提供的方法和属性的包装命令行工具的任务的默认实现。This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of a task that wraps a command line tool. ## Examples 下面的示例创建运行一次[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和类用于生成所需运行任务的信息。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. summary.span: 通过以下方式取消正在执行任务的进程：请求该进程正常关闭，在经过短时间的等待之后，强制终止该进程。

span.span: Cancels the process executing the task by asking it to close nicely, then after a short period, forcing termination.

param.span: 要删除的临时文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the temporary file to delete.

summary.span: 删除指定的临时文件。

span.span: Deletes the specified temporary file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果出于任何原因失败的删除操作 （例如，如果文件被锁定的防病毒软件），则此方法记录一条警告，而不是引发异常，这会导致生成失败。If the delete operation fails for any reason (such as if a file is locked by antivirus software), then this method logs a warning rather than throwing an exception, which would cause the build to fail.

summary.span: 获取一组环境变量名称-值对。

span.span: Gets a set of environment variable name-value pairs.

summary.span: 可在自定义任务类（从 ToolTask 派生）中重写以返回一组新的或更改的环境变量，从而创建关联工具的执行上下文。

span.span: Designed to be overridden in a custom task class (derived from ToolTask) to return a set of new or altered environment variables to create the execution context of the associated tool.
Returns a set of environment variables.

value.span: 每个字典键均为要重写的环境变量的名称，而字典值是要为该环境变量设置的值。

span.span: Each dictionary key is the name of the environment variable to override and the dictionary value is the value to set for that environment variable.

value.span: EnvironmentOverride 的默认实现返回 null。

span.span: The default implementation of EnvironmentOverride returns null.

summary.span: 除了（或者有选择地重写）常规的环境块外，应传递到生成的可执行文件的用等号分隔的环境变量对的数组。

span.span: Array of equals-separated pairs of environment variables that should be passed to the spawned executable, in addition to (or selectively overriding) the regular environment block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此而不 EnvironmentOverride 时 StringDictionary，这不能设置从 MSBuild 项目。Using this instead of EnvironmentOverride as that takes a StringDictionary, which cannot be set from an MSBuild project.

summary.span: 返回要在其中运行可执行文件的目录。

span.span: Returns the directory in which to run the executable file.

returns.span: 要在其中运行可执行文件的目录；如果要在当前目录中运行可执行文件，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The directory in which to run the executable file, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the executable file should be run in the current directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一种方法，而不是属性，以便派生的类 （如 Exec) 可以选择公开一个公共的 WorkingDirectory 属性，并可能会造成混淆，使其具有两个属性。This is a method rather than a property so that derived classes (like Exec) can choose to expose a public WorkingDirectory property, and it would be confusing to have two properties.

summary.span: 获取任务的标准错误流的 。

span.span: Gets the of the standard error stream of the task.
The of the response file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，基于控制台的输出使用当前系统 OEM 代码页。Console-based output uses the current system OEM code page by default. 请注意，我们不应使用-通过将 Console.OutputEncoding 此处由于我们运行的进程实际上没有太大关系与我们的控制台窗口 （也还-通过将 Console.OutputEncoding 不会返回的 OEM 代码页，如果运行的应用程序承载 MSBuild 不是一个控制台应用程序）。Note that we should not use Console.OutputEncoding here since processes we run don't really have much to do with our console window (and also Console.OutputEncoding doesn't return the OEM code page if the running application that hosts MSBuild is not a console application).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定工具任务是否将为命令行创建一个批处理文件并使用命令处理器执行该文件，而不是直接执行该命令。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the tool task will create a batch file for the command-line and execute that using the command-processor, rather than executing the command directly.

value.span: 如果为 true，则该工具任务将为命令行创建一个批处理文件并使用命令处理器执行该文件。

span.span: If true, the tool task will create a batch file for the command-line and execute that using the command-processor.

value.span: 如果为 false，则工具任务将直接执行该命令。

span.span: If false the tool task will execute the command directly.
